source.name: A&I - Safety Programs - Data Mining Tool
source.description: This area of the website provides information on three of the safety programs established by FMCSA to support this mission. The three programs covered by this area include reviews, roadside inspections of commercial vehicles and drivers, and traffic enforcement stops of CMVs operating in an unsafe manner. Each program is implemented in conjunction with the states and devoted to improving motor carrier safety by reducing the number and severity of crashes involving large trucks and buses.
